Grammar:    DataElement 4.0
Namespace:  shr.test

EntryElement: TypeConstraintOnValue
Based on:     SimpleBase
Description:  "It is a simple element based on SimpleBase and specializing the value"
Value:        Simple is type Simple2

EntryElement: TypeConstraintOnValueChild
Based on:     ComplexBase
Description:  "It is a simple element based on SimpleBase and specializing the value's child"
Value:        Complex
1..1          Complex.Simple is type Simple2

EntryElement: TypeConstraintOnField
Description:  "It is a group entry with a type constraint on a field"
Based on:     GroupBase
              Simple is type Simple2

EntryElement: TypeConstraintOnFieldChild
Description:  "It is a group entry with a type constraint on a field's child"
0..1    Simple
0..1    Complex
1..2    Complex.Simple is type Simple2

EntryElement: TypeConstraintOnFieldValue
Based on:     Group2
Description:  "It is a group entry with a type constraint on a field's value"
              HasSimpleValue value is type Simple2

Element:      SimpleBase
Value:        Simple

Element:      Simple
Value:        string

Element:      Simple2
Based on:     Simple
Value:        string

Element:      ComplexBase
Value:        Complex

Element:      Complex
0..1          Simple
1..*          CodedFromValueSet

Element:      CodedFromValueSet
Value:        code from http://standardhealthrecord.org/test/vs/Coded

Element:      GroupBase
0..1          Simple
0..1          CodedFromValueSet with code from http://standardhealthrecord.org/test/vs/Coded2

Element:      HasSimpleValue
Value:        Simple

Element:      Group2
0..1          HasSimpleValue
0..1          CodedFromValueSet with code from http://standardhealthrecord.org/test/vs/Coded2
